Name: Sagar Awasthi
AboutMe:
Hello and thank you for viewing my profile!

Passionate about emerging technologies, I apply 11 years of management & programming experiences to help organization takes new ideas & transform them into revenue generating products & solutions.

As a Project Manager, I’ve experienced projects at all stages of the life-cycle from concept to closure. I'm a seasoned programmer, leader & strategist. I‘ve worn many hats in my career-manager, programmer, researcher, creative head, marketer & strategist. As a result, I’ve a unique ability to manage multi-disciplinary projects and to navigate complex challenges within deadlines.

Communicating fluently across technical and C-levels, I lead by motivating cross-functional teams and implementing a highly organized strategy that delivers powerful results.

Specialties: Agile project management, Operational management, Project planning, Business strategy, Work stream management, creative direction, training and employee development, Requirements gathering, web development, AngularJS, Python, Django, PHP Development- CodeIgniter, Zend Framework, Cakephp, Laravel, WordPress, Joomla, Drupal. Magento, UI/UX Design.
